ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Solusek A
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks.  Somehow I misinterpretted your advice as meaning to also keep you back to the wall while pulling in case you get stunned and something horrible comes
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. Somehow I misinterpretted your advice as meaning to also keep you
back to the wall while pulling in case you get stunned and something
horrible comes up from behind.

Unrelated: Bumped into Keeybler Elf yesterday in Rivervale. Obvious racial
conflict aside, I think the name would have been funnier on a gnome. Wonder
if he's a master baker? <g>

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:elijah@...]
> Sent: Thursday, March 16, 2000 9:36 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Solusek A
>
>
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> >This may be a really dumb question, but how do you keep your
> back to the
> >wall when pulling? If you're headed back to your group,
> your front is to
> >them and your back is to the pullee. What am I missing?
>
>
> Not much *laughs* I just meant keep your back to the wall
> while fighting,
> while pulling just try and keep a good head start and have
> your healer
> target you before you go. :o)
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
>
